Description: Recreates the @someone April Fools joke, which will mention a random member in the server. Limited to those who can mention @everyone to prevent abuse.
Locks a channel until it is unlocked, which prevents members from sending messages in that channel.
A customizable filter module that will delete cuss, vulgar, or discriminatory words.
Sets a custom slowmode for a channel or server.
A customizable filter module that will delete cuss, vulgar, or discriminatory words.
Shows some useful information about the server.
Shows some useful information about a server member.
Deletes discord invites sent in the server. Administrators are excluded.
